backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor file serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five hero section modifications: replacing video with static botanical image, removing overlays, adding text shadow, preventing solid background boxes, and removing animated gradients.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, contexts, and data files describing the plant e-commerce application structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color schemes using oklch color space for sage-green botanical aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the GreenLeaf application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with five routes (Home, Shop, ProductDetail, CareGuide, Checkout) and wrapping with ThemeProvider, CartProvider, and WishlistProvider.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-in cart drawer component from the right side with item management (quantity controls, remove), empty state, subtotal display, and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with four-column grid layout containing site links, social media icons, and attribution to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper containing Navbar, page content outlet, Footer, and CartDrawer with state management for cart visibility.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Loading spinner component with rotating sage-green border animation using Tailwind CSS.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar component with responsive mobile menu, cart button with item count badge, scroll-based styling, and navigation links to Home, Shop, and Care Guide pages.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Simple wrapper component that applies fade-in and slide-in animation effects to page content during transitions.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component displaying product image, name, description, price, rating, and wishlist button with hover effects and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/WishlistButton.t: Heart-shaped button component that toggles product wishlist status with visual feedback and animation effects.
frontend/src/context/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart state management with localStorage persistence, including add/remove/update operations, item count, and subtotal calculations.
frontend/src/context/WishlistContext.tsx: React context managing wishlist state with localStorage persistence, providing toggle and check functions for product IDs.
frontend/src/data/careGuides.ts: Static data array containing plant care guide articles with titles, excerpts, categories, reading times, and placeholder images.
frontend/src/data/categories.ts: Static data array defining plant categories (Succulents, Tropical, Low-Light, Pet-Friendly) with descriptions and images.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Static product catalog containing detailed plant information including names, prices, care requirements, difficulty levels, and stock status for 8+ plant varieties.
frontend/src/data/testimonials.ts: Static array of customer testimonials with names, quotes, and 5-star ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an Internet Computer actor instance based on authentication state, with automatic query invalidation when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Custom React hooks for responsive design: useMediaQuery tracks CSS media query matches, and useIsMobile detects mobile viewports (max-width: 768px).
frontend/src/hooks/useScroll.ts: React hook that tracks window scroll position, direction (up/down), and whether the page has scrolled past 50px threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: React hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when a referenced element becomes visible in the viewport, useful for triggering scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using sage green and beige color palettes, plus utility classes for glassmorphism, gradients, scrollbars, and shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CareGuide.tsx: Displays a list of plant care guide articles with reading progress bar, category tags, reading time estimates, and staggered fade-in animations.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Multi-step checkout page with form validation, order summary, cart item display, and shipping/tax calculations; redirects to shop if cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page featuring hero section with botanical imagery, featured products, plant care tips, benefits sections, testimonials, and newsletter signup with scroll-based animations and parallax effects.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page component that displays individual product information, images, care indicators, related products, and handles add-to-cart functionality with animations and wishlist integration.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Shop page component with filterable product grid supporting category, price range, water level, and sunlight filters, with responsive mobile/desktop filter sidebar.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Product, CartItem, Category, Testimonial, and CareGuide interfaces used throughout the application.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (sage, beige), OKLCH color system, custom animations (accordion, float), and extended theme utilities for the plant store design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural decisions (frontend-only, static data, local storage cart), existing features, image requirements, and implementation notes for the GreenLeaf e-commerce plant store.
